title: New K/DA ward
body: So I just purchased the ahri set for the new K/DA set and it said it comes with a new ward skin but when I went to change my ward it said that I had to buy it with world tokens.  Is this a glitch or do you have to purchase it separately?

replies.body:
If you bought it in the bundle then you won't have to buy it again. Try closing and restarting your client, then checking in your collection if it is there. You may have to scroll down to the bottom to find it.

If it still isn't available even after restarting your client, you will need to send in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They will be able to see you purchased it, and hopefully can fix the bug.

gimme that GIF.
the one with the laughing fish, I need it.

Y E S
MY collection is complete.
thank you.
